Author:
Frédéric Hubin (frederic.hubin@gmail.com)

  • Method Details

    • setMode

      void setMode​(TezosContractStorage.Mode mode) throws TezosException
      Sets the mode for the storage.
      Parameters:
      mode - CACHED or REAL_TIME
      Throws:
      TezosException - if mode is null

    • getMode

      TezosContractStorage.Mode getMode()
      Returns the storage mode.
      Returns:
      the storage mode

    • load

      void load() throws TezosStorageException
      Loads the storage from the chain.
      Throws:
      TezosStorageException - if the storage cannot be loaded.

    • getTimestamp

      long getTimestamp()
      Returns the timestamp of the last time the storage was loaded from the chain.
      Returns:
      the time of the last load or zero if nothing has been loaded yet.

    • getData

      T getData()
      Returns the instance of the data class.
      Returns:
      an instance of the data class.

    • getDataClass

      Class<T> getDataClass()
      Returns the data class.
      Returns:
      the data class.
